name: Project Hunter
description:
Stealth and tactic game that give you the control of an alien that evolves, adquire new abilities and face levels in various ways.

  • control An Alien That Eats Humans.
  • sneak Up and Murder Your Enemies Brutally.
  • Evolve to become the apex predator of your enviroment.
  • Add new skills to your set that Will allow you to Hunt and advance in various ways.
  • Survive in a hostile enviroment.

Abilities

You Will have different abilities depending on your evolve stage

Dash: this abilitie will make you able to do a fast move forward, so you can evade your enemies easier.

Spit: this abilitie will make you able to mislead your enemies to the place you want.

Invisible: this abilitie will make you invisible for a limited time, but be careful you may be detected by some enemy security ítems!


And more abilities that you will learn along the way !
